author: Cat
install_msg: Thanks for installing the User Tracker cog! This powerful tool allows real-time tracking and logging of user activities. Use `[p]help UserTracker` to see available commands. Note: Only authorized users can use these commands by default. Please ensure you have the necessary permissions set up.
name: UserTracker
short: Advanced user activity tracking and analysis tool.
description: This cog provides comprehensive tracking and logging of user activities in real-time, including messages, voice state changes, status updates, and image attachments. It features individual user logs in threads, sentiment analysis, activity heatmaps, and word clouds. The cog maintains a main message with links to these threads for easy navigation.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Discord User IDs for tracked users, along with their message content, voice activity, status changes, and image URLs. It also generates and stores sentiment analysis data and activity patterns. No personal data beyond what's visible in Discord is stored or processed externally.
